text.headline: My Professional Journey
text.text:
A timeline of key milestones that highlight my technical growth, problem-solving abilities, and dedication to excellence. Each achievement showcases my skills and contributions across various projects.
Discover why I'm prepared to add value to your organization at the conclusion.

text.headline: Scored 88.40% in 10th grade
text.text: Studied in Anjuman Islam Janjira High School for class 10th and scored 88.40% in Maharashtra Board Examination.

text.headline: 12th Science with PCMB
text.text: Studied in Anjuman Islam Janjira Jr. College for class 12th and scored 92.50%

text.headline: Saraswati College Of Engineering, Kharghar
text.text: Started pursuing Bachelors of engineering in CSE with specialization Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.

media.caption: Henry Vu at the NASA Space App Challenge.

text.headline: Participated in NASA Space App Challenge
text.text: Gained valuable experience by developing an intelligent project collaboration system, applying skills in machine learning and web development.

media.caption: Henry Vu at the Quasar 2.0 Hackathon.

text.headline: 1st Prize - Quasar 2.0 Hackathon
text.text: Developed an innovative AI Proctored Exam System that excelled in real-time monitoring and cheating detection, securing 1st place.
